channel.title: ~slow, lag, disconnection then banned~ Please help
channel.description:
So i finaly got my server online but when i log in its slow and laggy, then it disconnects me after like being on it for 20 secs and bans me
Please help, I have no idea what to do... :confused:

item.title: ~slow, lag, disconnection then banned~ Please help
item.dc:creator: @dds_hustl3r dds hustl3r
item.description:
@dds_hustl3r wrote:

when you log in ur server, dont put anything in the ip. only put ur username and password and have ur server on and log in. that should fix the problem
